version_description: Minor bug fixes and usability enhancements.
Minor bug fixes and usability enhancements.

+ Send Messages To Your Friends From Within The App
+ See Which of Your Friends Have Upcoming Birthdays
+ Show Our Gift Guides From Within The App

+ Send Messages To Your Friends From Within The App
+ See Which of Your Friends Have Upcoming Birthdays
+ Show Our Gift Guides From Within The App

Improved the sign-up and login process when using Facebook. It no longer requires editing the Facebook settings.
The state/province field wasn't displayed when viewing your draw for an exchange.
Various small bug fixes and improved stability

Improved the sign-up and login process when using Facebook. It no longer requires editing the Facebook settings.
The state/province field wasn't displayed when viewing your draw for an exchange.
Various small bug fixes and improved stability

We have completely redesigned the Elfster app, giving it a new look, making it easier to use, and added many great new features.  Improvements to wish lists and shopping as well as managing exchanges you organize.  Create and link child accounts, receive push notifications, manage profile information and so much more.  Exchange organizers can now easily manage exchanges from within the app, setting draw restrictions, privacy settings, and filtering participants.

We have completely redesigned the Elfster app, giving it a new look, making it easier to use, and added many great new features.  Improvements to wish lists and shopping as well as managing exchanges you organize.  Create and link child accounts, receive push notifications, manage profile information and so much more.  Exchange organizers can now easily manage exchanges from within the app, setting draw restrictions, privacy settings, and filtering participants.
Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes

- Limit Friends tab to people you follow
- Search for and follow friends already on Elfster
- Bug fixes

- Limit Friends tab to people you follow
- Search for and follow friends already on Elfster
- Bug fixes

In this release we’ve made many improvements to performance, usability and fixed several bugs. We have also added new features for managing wish lists and exchanges.

You can now reorder your Wish List, placing things you want most at the top, by simply dragging and dropping items.

Exchange organizers can now easily view the profile for an exchange participant by tapping on the person in the list. We have also added the ability to create custom exchange groups as part of the New Exchange setup process.

In this release we’ve made many improvements to performance, usability and fixed several bugs. We have also added new features for managing wish lists and exchanges.

You can now reorder your Wish List, placing things you want most at the top, by simply dragging and dropping items.

Exchange organizers can now easily view the profile for an exchange participant by tapping on the person in the list. We have also added the ability to create custom exchange groups as part of the New Exchange setup process.

In this release we've made improvements to push notifications, creating new exchanges, adding text wishes and fixed several bugs.  You can now add text only wishes to your wish list.  Text wishes are great for adding things to your wish list that you can't find on the web.

In this release we've made improvements to push notifications, creating new exchanges, adding text wishes and fixed several bugs.  You can now add text only wishes to your wish list.  Text wishes are great for adding things to your wish list that you can't find on the web.
In this release we've made the application more user friendly and have improved accuracy when scanning bar-codes.  We have also fixed a number of bugs.
In this release we've made the application more user friendly and have improved accuracy when scanning bar-codes.  We have also fixed a number of bugs.

Hello Elfster Users!

We're getting ready for Christmas 2017 with a better name and cleaned up categories.

As always please let us know if there is any way we can serve you better help@elfster.com.

Elfingly yours,
Team Elfster

Hello Elfster Users!

We're getting ready for Christmas 2017 with a better name and cleaned up categories.

As always please let us know if there is any way we can serve you better help@elfster.com.

Elfingly yours,
Team Elfster

Hello Elfster Users!

We hope you love this new release! Now iPhone X owners have another reason to love their new iPhone - Elfster works on it :)

The Elves must be crazy as we never thought we would be able to make the App this awesome in time for 2017! In this version we have added great new features.

Updates Include:

+ It's easier to add to your wish list.

+ Exchange organizers can now do just about everything you can do on our website.
- Manually assign participants
- Ability to view draw details
- Manage draw restrictions
- Complete messaging functionality
- View whether gifts have been sent and received
- And much more!

+ Support for iPhone X and facial recognition for sign in.

+ Tabs have been reordered to better match the way you work.

+ Miscellaneous bug fixes

+ Many usability improvements

As always, send us an email at help@elfster.com if you've got any tips. We love your feedback and welcome ways to serve you

Elfingly yours,
Team Elfster

As always, send us an email at help@elfster.com if you've got any tips. We love your feedback and welcome ways to serve you

Elfingly yours,
Team Elfster

Hello Elfster Users! We’ve made things even easier for our organizers, wishers and gift givers.

+ Adding wishes to your wish list is quicker and easier.

+ Exchange organizers can now easily view wish lists for participants in an exchange.

+ Miscellaneous usability improvements and bug fixes.

Hello Elfster Users! We’ve made things even easier for our organizers, wishers and gift givers.

+ Adding wishes to your wish list is quicker and easier.

+ Exchange organizers can now easily view wish lists for participants in an exchange.

+ Miscellaneous usability improvements and bug fixes.
Bug fixes and general improvements
Bug fixes and general improvements

Hello Elfster users! The elves have been working hard to make Elfster better for you so you can focus on the best part of gift giving, having fun!

+ Gift Exchange organizers will appreciate improvements for creating and managing Gift Exchanges.

+ Participants in Gift Exchanges can now add and view shipping information for their gifts.

+ Wish Lists just got better! Whether you’re looking for the perfect gift for a friend or have multiple Wish Lists, working with Wish Lists is quick and easy.

+ Miscellaneous usability improvements and tweaks so your Elfster experience is better than ever.

Hello Elfster users! The elves have been working hard to make Elfster better for you so you can focus on the best part of gift giving, having fun!

+ Gift Exchange organizers will appreciate improvements for creating and managing Gift Exchanges.

+ Participants in Gift Exchanges can now add and view shipping information for their gifts.

+ Wish Lists just got better! Whether you’re looking for the perfect gift for a friend or have multiple Wish Lists, working with Wish Lists is quick and easy.

+ Miscellaneous usability improvements and tweaks so your Elfster experience is better than ever.

Hello Elfster users! Are you ready for the holidays?! We sure are :)

We elves have been busy improving Elfster to give you a fun and easy gift giving experience. We hope you’ll love what we have in store for you.

+ It’s easier than ever for new Elfster users to start a Gift Exchange with friends and family.

+ New users can easily invite people from their contacts list and share invitation links using your favorite social media apps.

+ Various bug fixes and usability improvements.

Hello Elfster users! Are you ready for the holidays?! We sure are :)

We elves have been busy improving Elfster to give you a fun and easy gift giving experience. We hope you’ll love what we have in store for you.

+ It’s easier than ever for new Elfster users to start a Gift Exchange with friends and family.

+ New users can easily invite people from their contacts list and share invitation links using your favorite social media apps.

+ Various bug fixes and usability improvements.

Hello Elfster users! We hope you are enjoying the holiday season, we elves sure are :slightly_smiling_face:

We have some great new updates to share with you.

+ Our updated New Gift Exchange wizard now allows you to:
- Easily invite your friends and family using your Contacts list.
- Start a new Gift Exchange using a group from a previous Gift Exchange.
- Easily share links to your Gift Exchange using your favorite social media apps.

+ Various bug fixes and usability improvements.

We have some great new updates to share with you.

+ Our updated New Gift Exchange wizard now allows you to:
- Easily invite your friends and family using your Contacts list.
- Start a new Gift Exchange using a group from a previous Gift Exchange.
- Easily share links to your Gift Exchange using your favorite social media apps.

+ Various bug fixes and usability improvements.

Hello Elfster users! We hope you are enjoying the wonderful treats and festivities of the holiday season.

The elves have been been working to improve your gift giving experience and hope you’ll love the updates.

+ Exchanging gifts at a party? Your participants will now have easier access to party details.
+ Various bug fixes and usability improvements.

Hello Elfster users! We hope you are enjoying the wonderful treats and festivities of the holiday season.

The elves have been been working to improve your gift giving experience and hope you’ll love the updates.

+ Exchanging gifts at a party? Your participants will now have easier access to party details.

Hello Elfster users! We hope you are enjoying everything that makes the holidays wonderful.
The elves have been fixing a few things to improve your gift giving experience and hope you’ll love the updates.

+ Various bug fixes and usability improvements.

Hello Elfster users! We hope you are enjoying everything that makes the holidays wonderful.
The elves have been fixing a few things to improve your gift giving experience and hope you’ll love the updates.

Hello Elfster users! The elves have made some awesome updates to the Elfster app and are very excited to share them with you.

Gift Exchange organizers have great new features for creating and managing their Gift Exchanges, it has never been easier!
+ You can now invite friends and family using your contact list.
+ Quickly share Gift Exchange invitation links anywhere, social media, email, text, the sky's the limit.
+ Easily manage participants in your Gift Exchange, see their gift status, send messages and much more.

Elfster users will also appreciate these updates:
+ Manage the order of your Wish Lists
+ Ability to view Wish item notes
+ Ask your Elfster Friends questions with our Secret Q&A feature to get to know them better
+ Various bug fixes and performance improvements.

Hello Elfster users! The elves have made some awesome updates to the Elfster app and are very excited to share them with you.

Gift Exchange organizers have great new features for creating and managing their Gift Exchanges, it has never been easier!
+ You can now invite friends and family using your contact list.
+ Quickly share Gift Exchange invitation links anywhere, social media, email, text, the sky's the limit.
+ Easily manage participants in your Gift Exchange, see their gift status, send messages and much more.

Elfster users will also appreciate these updates:
+ Manage the order of your Wish Lists
+ Ability to view Wish item notes
+ Ask your Elfster Friends questions with our Secret Q&A feature to get to know them better
+ Various bug fixes and performance improvements.

Hello Elfster users! This update brings many awesome new features to our app.

Gift Exchange organizers can now:
+ Allow participants in your exchange to invite others.
+ Require invitees to have participated in a specified number of previous exchanges.
+ Allow participants to indicate if they are willing to ship gifts internationally for multi country Gift Exchanges.

Elfster users will appreciate these updates:
+ Ability to add and manage accounts for children and other family members.
+ Improved feature for managing who can view your Wish List
+ Various bug fixes and performance improvements.

Hello Elfster users! This update brings many awesome new features to our app.

Gift Exchange organizers can now:
+ Allow participants in your exchange to invite others.
+ Require invitees to have participated in a specified number of previous exchanges.
+ Allow participants to indicate if they are willing to ship gifts internationally for multi country Gift Exchanges.

Elfster users will appreciate these updates:
+ Ability to add and manage accounts for children and other family members.
+ Improved feature for managing who can view your Wish List
+ Various bug fixes and performance improvements.

Hello Elfster users! The elves have been working hard to make your Elfster experience better than ever.

+ Gift Exchange Assistants can now manage exchanges through the app.
+ Need to manage an account for a child or other family member? The elves have you covered with new Family Management features.
+ Adding wishes has been improved to help others get you that special something you really want.
+ Know when you have unanswered secret questions from your Elfster friends.
+ Various bug fixes and performance improvements.

Hello Elfster users! The elves have been working hard to make your Elfster experience better than ever.

+ Gift Exchange Assistants can now manage exchanges through the app.
+ Need to manage an account for a child or other family member? The elves have you covered with new Family Management features.
+ Adding wishes has been improved to help others get you that special something you really want.
+ Know when you have unanswered secret questions from your Elfster friends.
+ Various bug fixes and performance improvements.

Hello Elfster users! We hope your wishes are being fulfilled and that you are having fun fulfilling those of your family and friends.
In this update:

+ Let us know how much you enjoy Elfster with our new in-app rating features.
+ You can now get suggestions for text wishes made by your family and friends.
+ Various bug fixes and performance improvements.

Hello Elfster users! We hope your wishes are being fulfilled and that you are having fun fulfilling those of your family and friends.
In this update:

+ Let us know how much you enjoy Elfster with our new in-app rating features.
+ You can now get suggestions for text wishes made by your family and friends.
+ Various bug fixes and performance improvements.

Hello Elfster users! The elves have added some great new feature to make your Gift Exchanges even more awesome.
In this update:

+ It is easier now to view your draw's Wish List in a Gift Exchange by simply tapping on the person when viewing your Gift Exchange.
+ When allowed by the Gift Exchange Organizer, Participants can easily invite people to join using their devices contact list.
+ Various bug fixes and performance improvements.

Hello Elfster users! The elves have added some great new feature to make your Gift Exchanges even more awesome.
In this update:

+ It is easier now to view your draw's Wish List in a Gift Exchange by simply tapping on the person when viewing your Gift Exchange.
+ When allowed by the Gift Exchange Organizer, Participants can easily invite people to join using their devices contact list.

Hello Elfster users!
Us elves, with our tiny nimble fingers and obsession with details have been tinkering both outside and under the hood making our app awesomer for you.

Hello Elfster users!
Us elves, with our tiny nimble fingers and obsession with details have been tinkering both outside and under the hood making our app awesomer for you.

Hello Elfster givers and wishers!
The elves have completely remodeled the Shop experience for you. We can't wait for you to check it out!

+ It's easier for you to find and add items to your Wish Lists.
+ Animated icons make liking and following gift guides fun.
+ You can now filter items you are searching for by store and price ranges.
+ Easily follow and share the gift guides you like.
+ And much more!

Hello Elfster givers and wishers!
The elves have completely remodeled the Shop experience for you. We can't wait for you to check it out!

+ It's easier for you to find and add items to your Wish Lists.
+ Animated icons make liking and following gift guides fun.
+ You can now filter items you are searching for by store and price ranges.
+ Easily follow and share the gift guides you like.
+ And much more!

Hello Elfster users! Our busy little elves have made some great improvements to make your Gift Exchange and Shop experience better.

+ Our elf engineers have been hammering on the gears and tightening the screws to make it less likely your Gift Exchange participants will draw the same person they drew in a previous Gift Exchange.
+ Discovering Gift Guides is easier.
+ And much more!

Hello Elfster users! Our busy little elves have made some great improvements to make your Gift Exchange and Shop experience better.

+ Our elf engineers have been hammering on the gears and tightening the screws to make it less likely your Gift Exchange participants will draw the same person they drew in a previous Gift Exchange.
+ Discovering Gift Guides is easier.
+ And much more!

Hello Elfster users!
The holidays are just around the corner and we have a great new app feature to help keep you up to date on activity with your friends, family and Gift Exchanges! Check out the bell icon in the nav bar.

+ See when your family and friends make wishes.
+ Get social by liking, adding comments and replies.
+ Participate in polls and much more!

+ See when your family and friends make wishes.
+ Get social by liking, adding comments and replies.
+ Participate in polls and much more!

Hello Elfster users!
The elves are getting excited for the holidays and have been adding new features and tightening the nuts and bolts under the hood to ensure you have a great Elfster experience.
+ Ask your Gift Exchange invitees Ice Breaker questions to help the group get to know one another better.
+ Sharing Wish Lists with Family and Friends couldn't be easier.
+ And much more!

Hello Elfster users!
The elves are getting excited for the holidays and have been adding new features and fixing the glitches so you have a great experience with Elfster.
+ Invite your friends to Elfster without creating a group or Gift Exchange.
+ Elfster Share extension updated to easily add wishes from anywhere!
+ And much more!

Hello Elfster users!
The elves are getting excited for the holidays and have been adding new features and fixing the glitches so you have a great experience with Elfster.
+ Invite your friends to Elfster without creating a group or Gift Exchange.
+ Elfster Share extension updated to easily add wishes from anywhere!
+ And much more!

Hello Elfster users!
We hope your holiday season is off to an amazing start. We elves know how busy it can get around the holidays so we keep a close eye on things to be sure you’re having a great Elfster experience.
+ You can now test the draw for your exchange to be sure everything looks good.
+ Easily share Wish Lists for accounts in your Family Manager.
+ Shop got even more awesome.
+ And much more!

Hello fellow Elfsters!
Hope you are enjoying the magic of the holiday season. We elves know how much fun it is to give the perfect gift so we have added some new features to make it even easier.
+ You can now Poke your friends to add wishes to their Wish List.
+ Copying your friend's mailing address for sending gifts is now easier.
+ And much more!

Hello fellow Elfsters.
Hope your holiday wishes were fulfilled and that you are off to a great new year! The elves are already working hard to make your wishing and giving experience even better.
+ Want to make sure names will draw in your Gift Exchange without a hitch? Use our new test draw feature.
+ See a friend wish for something you too would like, you can now quickly add it to your wish list.
+ Easily share friend and family Wish Lists with others.
+ And much more!

Hello fellow Elfsters! Hope you are enjoying the magic of the holiday season. We elves know how busy it can get around the holidays, so we keep a close eye on things to be sure you’re having a great Elfster experience.

Here’s what’s new:
+ Easily view gift guides for different countries.
+ The elves added some fixes so your Activity feed is better than ever.
+ And much, much more.
